BeyondStart Solutions helps you fix, optimize or restart your digital project. 20 years of experience, with an enterprise background and startup agility.

What problems do we solve?

Is your Drupal site outdated and vulnerable? Is your Laravel system slow or buggy? Is your Shopify store underperforming? These problems can't wait – we specialize exactly in these.

With our three focused packages, we solve these problems efficiently within 72 hours.

Who we've worked with

Kinepolis

Drupal module development, maintenance, and migration for an international cinema multiplex system.

TechSoup Europe

Laravel-based admin interfaces and access control for the nonprofit sector.

ACEG Belgium

Internal ERP system rewritten in Laravel: access rights, records, PDF generation.

CompanyApp

Mobile internal communication platform with custom modules and performance optimization.

JudyNatale Handmade

Digital product startup with Laravel-based backend APIs and Vue.js frontend.

Columbia Games

US game publisher. Laravel-based e-commerce development and technical consulting.

Gödi Sittes

Static website for a waste transport service, featuring modern design and an automated build process.

About BeyondStart

BeyondStart Solutions was founded by Zoltán Horváth, who has been building digital systems for nearly 20 years. His references include the Kinepolis cinema network, TechSoup nonprofit platform, and ACEG internal ERP systems. Your business is in good hands with us – we don’t experiment, we solve problems.
